title: ICE "inconsistent resolution for an import" with two enums

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code

```rust
use self::A::*;
use V;
use self::B::*;
enum A {
    V
}
enum B {
    V
}
fn main() {}
```

### Error output

thread 'rustc' panicked at '[compiler/rustc_resolve/src/imports.rs:818](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233/compiler/rustc_resolve/src/imports.rs#L818): inconsistent resolution for an import', [compiler/rustc_middle/src/util/bug.rs:36](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233/compiler/rustc_middle/src/util/bug.rs#L36)

### Regression

Regression in nightly-2018-12-30

### Version

```
rustc 1.67.0-nightly (1eb62b123 2022-11-27)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 1eb62b1235fd77200e6bd967d70e83c0f2497233

host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.67.0-nightly
LLVM version: 15.0.4
```
